# Wander Peaks

> Premium Himalayan Trekking, Adventure Tours & Chardham Yatra Specialist | Based in Haridwar, Uttarakhand, India

## About

Wander Peaks is a leading adventure travel agency specializing in Himalayan treks, high-altitude expeditions, and sacred pilgrimages. With 10+ years of experience and 15,000+ happy travelers, we offer expertly guided adventures for trekkers, pilgrims, and nature enthusiasts exploring Uttarakhand's majestic landscapes.

**What We Offer:**
- High-altitude Himalayan treks (Tungnath, Chopta, Kedarnath)
- Sacred pilgrimage packages (Chardham, Do Dham, Panch Kedar)
- Adventure expeditions with experienced mountain guides
- Camping and wildlife experiences in Uttarakhand

## Adventure Trekking Destinations

### Popular Treks
- **Tungnath Trek**: World's highest Shiva temple at 3,680m, scenic meadows
- **Chopta Trek**: "Mini Switzerland of India", stunning Himalayan views
- **Deoria Tal Trek**: Pristine lake reflecting Chaukhamba peaks
- **Kedarnath Trek**: 16km spiritual trek through alpine terrain
- **Valley of Flowers**: UNESCO World Heritage Site, 600+ flower species

### Adventure Hotspots
- **Auli**: Skiing, cable car, panoramic Nanda Devi views
- **Rishikesh**: River rafting, bungee jumping, camping by Ganges
- **Chopta-Tungnath**: Beginner-friendly Himalayan trek
- **Har Ki Dun**: Remote valley trek, ancient villages

## Yatra (Pilgrimage) Pages

### Ek Dham & Do Dham
- [Kedarnath Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/kedarnath.html): Trek to Lord Shiva's abode at 3,583m
- [Badrinath Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/badrinath.html): Holy shrine of Lord Vishnu
- [Do Dham Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/do-dham.html): Kedarnath + Badrinath combined

### Char Dham
- [Char Dham Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/char-dham.html): Complete four-temple circuit
- [Char Dham by Helicopter](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/char-dham-helicopter.html): Premium helicopter pilgrimage

### Panch Kedar & Panch Badri
- [Panch Kedar](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-kedar.html): Five sacred Shiva temples trek
- [Panch Badri](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-badri.html): Five Vishnu temples circuit
- [Panch Prayag](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-prayag.html): Five sacred river confluences
